alert.note: Alert for Cleveland; McClain; Oklahoma (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued October 04 at 4:30PM CDT until October 04 at 5:00PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 500 PM CDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN OKLAHOMA...NORTHWESTERN CLEVELAND AND NORTHWESTERN MCCLAIN COUNTIES... At 430 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Newcastle, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Broadcast media. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Southern Oklahoma City, Norman, Moore, Midwest City, Del City, Newcastle, Valley Brook, Stanley Draper Lake, Tinker Air Force Base, and southwestern Lake Thunderbird. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
